name: Ducks Can Drive
description:
Ducks like to race, even in their own cars! Earn money by delivering food to fellow ducks in the city, then use this money to upgrade your vehicle. The better the vehicle, the better chance you have to win the race at the end of the day!

As a duck, you have a certain amount of time to be the best delivery driver you can possibly be, and upgrade your car any way you see fit. After these 10 minutes, you will race your friends and their perfect cars for a gold medal!

Features:
  • Multiplayer with friends!
  • Steam achievements!
  • Free to play!
  • Time Trial Singleplayer!
